model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Parent, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Co-workers A: I hope so. I just want to make sure we're all on the same page and working towards our goals.

[MEMORY]
1. Co-worker B appreciates the pen and thanks Co-worker A for the gesture.
2. Co-worker A gave Co-worker B a pen as a thoughtful gesture.
3. Co-worker A took over their family's business a few years ago and it has improved since then.
4. Co-worker B finished a project and sent it to the manager for review.
5. Co-worker A gave Co-worker B a pen as a symbol of trust in their professional relationship.
6. Both Co-worker A and Co-worker B value trust in their personal and professional relationships.
